mapper.sql: course_id, course_name, major_name, describe, study_time, is_delete, create_by, create_at, teacher_name, teachering_book, class_id
mapper.select:
select t_course.course_id, t_course.course_name, t_course.major_name, t_course.describe, t_course.study_time,t_institutions.institutions_name, t_course.teacher_name, t_course.teachering_book, t_course.class_id from t_course_institutions LEFT JOIN t_course ON t_course.course_id = t_course_institutions.course_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_course_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_course.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0
limit #{length} offset #{start}

select t_course.course_id, t_course.course_name, t_course.major_name, t_course.describe, t_course.study_time,t_institutions.institutions_name, t_course.teacher_name, t_course.teachering_book, t_course.class_id from t_course_institutions LEFT JOIN t_course ON t_course.course_id = t_course_institutions.course_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_course_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_course.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.institutions_name like #{search}
limit #{length} offset #{start}

select count(*) from t_course_institutions LEFT JOIN t_course ON t_course.course_id = t_course_institutions.course_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_course_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_course.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0

select count(*) from t_course_institutions LEFT JOIN t_course ON t_course.course_id = t_course_institutions.course_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_course_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_institutions.is_delete = 0 and t_course.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.institutions_name like #{search}
mapper.insert: insert into t_course (course_id, course_name, major_name, describe, study_time, is_delete, create_by, create_at, teacher_name, teachering_book) values (#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacheringBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

course_name,

mapper.update:
update t_course
course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
study_time = #{studyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
teacher_name = #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teachering_book = #{teacheringBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
